thread.title: Debbie Harris

author: Debbie Harris
title: Debbie Harris
text: We have used Dial a flight on many occasions as well as my husband using them for Business trips. Clark Maroof is our personal advisor and he has helped us plan a trip to Australia stopping off also in Dubai. Recommend Emirates on this occasion which was brilliant. We have just come back from Florida and he helped us save on upgrading to another airline. Give them ago, they have a wealth of knowledge and will always come back with a competitive Quote: . It takes the hassle out of trying to do it yourself...could not fault them.
